column2: "Thank you, <%me>. I can always count on you to accept my requests."
"People have witnessed spontaneous electrical discharges down in the Tunnels."
"Looking from the area environment, we're estimating that some mineral is having an effect in the Tunnels..."
"My request this time is for you to go observe the reported electrical discharge."
"I hate to bother you again, but I'll be looking forward to your findings. Thank you."
